item.source: I atk a npc and i freez

item.title: I atk a npc and i freez
item.dc:creator: @Sir_Nuckelz Sir Nuckelz
item.description:
@Sir_Nuckelz wrote:

You have to go into your source folder and go in autospawn and write:

spawn = Ip of Npc CoordX CoordY 0 0 0 0 1

(Space are to be done with the “Tab” botton or else the code won’t work)

Save and exit then go in Npc NOT Npcs.

Find the Npc according to its number and in the second line of numbers change the “0” to whatever you Hp you want the monster to have (It can be more than 99).

Jope that helps!

Read full topic

item.title: I atk a npc and i freez
item.dc:creator: @KiIIer KiIIer
item.description:
@KiIIer wrote:

If you added the npc through ::npc (id) then it’ll ALWAYS freeze because it has no hp. You gotta make it auto spawn and give it hp and stuff then u can fight it.
